kDesc
A new, designer bed for girls. Exclusive to the VEEMEE 3D Printer. [#Legal]
Un nouveau lit très tendance pour jeunes filles. Exclusif à l'Imprimante VEEMEE 3D. [#Legal]
Neues Designerbett für Mädchen. Exklusiv beim VEEMEE 3D-Drucker. [#Legal]
Un nuovo letto griffato per ragazze. In esclusiva per la Stampante 3D VEEMEE. [#Legal]
Una nueva cama de diseño para chica. En exclusiva para la Impresora VEEMEE 3D. [#Legal]

A new, designer bed for girls. Exclusive to the VEEMEE 3D Printer. \n\n※ Active items provide more functionality than normal items. You may only place limited numbers of the active items in your apartment or clubhouse at any time. [#Legal]
